components.name: GqJNNZ
components.content:
We need to ask some questions to check you can apply for this funding. We'll ask you to verify:

  • that you are a local authority in England
  • which type of grant you are applying for
  • that the area subject to a HSRA has been officially designated (refurbishment projects only)
  • that the property has been vacant for 366 days or more in the last 2 years (refurbishment projects only)
  • that the vacancy rate of the high street is 8% or higher (refurbishment projects only)

pages.title: Are you applying from a local authority in England?

pages.title: Which grant are you applying for?

components.hint: You must submit an application for every project you seek funding for.

pages.title: Has the property been vacant for 366 days or more in the last 2 years?

components.name: pPNbfh
components.title: Has the property been vacant for 366 days or more in the last 2 years?

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: oAnaAw
components.content:
Based on your answer, you’re not eligible to apply for funding to cover the cost of delivering a high street rental auction.

The property must have been vacant for 366 days or more in the last 2 years.

Check who can apply in the High Street Rental Auctions Fund prospectus.

pages.title: Is the vacancy rate in the designated high street or town centre 8% or higher?

components.name: Mhzypt
components.title: Is the vacancy rate in the designated high street or town centre 8% or higher?

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: LpLRZy
components.content:
Based on your answer, you’re not eligible to apply for funding to cover the cost of delivering a high street rental auction.

The property must be in a designated high street with a vacancy rate of 8% or higher.

Check who can apply in the High Street Rental Auctions Fund prospectus.

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: GuqDsJ
components.content:
Based on your answer, you’re not eligible to apply for funding to cover the cost of delivering a high street rental auction.

You must be applying from local authority in England.

Check who can apply in the High Street Rental Auctions Fund prospectus.

pages.title: Has the high street or town centre subject to the HSRA been officially designated?

components.name: MaUaFc
components.title: Has the high street or town centre subject to the HSRA been officially designated?

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: shDNbE
components.content:
Based on your answer, you’re not eligible to apply for funding to cover the cost of delivering a high street rental auction.

You must have officially designated high street or town centre subject to a HSRA.

Check who can apply in the High Street Rental Auctions Fund prospectus.
